content: I extend my deepest condolences on behalf of my country. Our two nations share mutual economic and security interests. As a result, we should maintain diplomatic ties and collaborate to address shared concerns in our strategic relationship.
I wish to remind you that the two of us share exceptional historical bonds that have been reflected in our support for democratic values.

Even though we have had significant strategic frictions between our countries in the past decade or so, both of our countries currently enjoy fruitful commercial relationships. As a result of this relationship, both countries benefit from economic growth. We hope you will be prudent and not take any reckless steps.

action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship

content: We think the nuclear attack of Red on Purple was unlawful. We condemn this.
Green conducted a nuclear strike on Red without providing a justification to us. We condemn Green for not consulting their allies prior to conducting the strike and acting so aggressively.

content: We are united in our alliance. We will prevail.
We condemn your military posturing against Orange as you are escalating the conflict.
We call for your assistance in keeping the peace by opening dialogue with Orange.
